_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

Identifying with the six sense bases [sn: They don’t identify with the eye
They don’t identify with eye consciousness
They don’t identify with eye contact
They don’t identify with the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by eye contact
They don’t identify with the ear
They don’t identify with the nose
They don’t identify with the tongue
They don’t identify with the body
They don’t identify with the mind
They don’t identify with the pleasant, painful, or neutral feeling that arises conditioned by mind contact
